Reviews.Title: Problems with windows 8
Reviews.Author: Evangelos Katsaros
Reviews.Content: Many problems with windows 8 preinstallation. Notebook did not shut down properly. After many workarounds found with Google managed to solve the problems. The display colours are not very good.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Nova Nalondwa
Reviews.Content: laptop works, came as expected and works just fine. it is as light as i expected and had no faults

Reviews.Title: It was defected
Reviews.Author: Yi Min Tseng
Reviews.Content: I reboot several times, and it couldn't go into windows screen any more. Therefore I returned it and bought another one from Dell
